languages.text: Вы находите единственный приказ, отданный Леди Теодорой: абордажной группе было велено проникнуть на корабль ксеносов и задержать противника, пока флагман династии не уйдет на безопасное расстояние.
You find a single order given by Lady Theodora. The boarding party was commanded to infiltrate the xenos vessel and hold off the enemy until the dynasty flagship withdraws to a safe distance.
languages.original_text: Вы находите единственный приказ, отданный Леди Теодорой: абордажной группе было велено проникнуть на корабль ксеносов и задержать противника, пока флагман династии не уйдет на безопасное расстояние.

traits.locale_text: You find a single order given by Lady Theodora. The boarding party was commanded to infiltrate the xenos vessel and hold off the enemy until the dynasty flagship withdraws to a safe distance.

You find a single order given by Lady Theodora. The boarding party was commanded to infiltrate the xenos vessel and hold off the enemy until the dynasty flagship withdraws to a safe distance.

languages.text: Du findest einen Befehl von Lady Theodora. Das Enterkommando sollte das Xenos-Schiff infiltrieren und den Feind aufhalten, um den Rückzug des Flaggschiffs der Dynastie zu ermöglichen.
languages.original_text: You find a single order given by Lady Theodora. The boarding party was commanded to infiltrate the xenos vessel and hold off the enemy until the dynasty flagship withdraws to a safe distance.

traits.locale_text: Du findest einen Befehl von Lady Theodora. Das Enterkommando sollte das Xenos-Schiff infiltrieren und den Feind aufhalten, um den Rückzug des Flaggschiffs der Dynastie zu ermöglichen.

languages.text: Vous y trouvez un ordre émis par dame Théodora. Le groupe d'abordage était censé infiltrer le vaisseau xénos et tenir l'ennemi en respect le temps que le vaisseau amiral de la dynastie se replie à saine distance.
languages.original_text: You find a single order given by Lady Theodora. The boarding party was commanded to infiltrate the xenos vessel and hold off the enemy until the dynasty flagship withdraws to a safe distance.

traits.locale_text: Vous y trouvez un ordre émis par dame Théodora. Le groupe d'abordage était censé infiltrer le vaisseau xénos et tenir l'ennemi en respect le temps que le vaisseau amiral de la dynastie se replie à saine distance.

languages.text: Encuentras una única orden emitida por lady Theodora. El grupo de abordaje debía infiltrarse en la nave xenos y contener al enemigo hasta que la nave insignia de la dinastía se retirara a una distancia segura.
languages.original_text: You find a single order given by Lady Theodora. The boarding party was commanded to infiltrate the xenos vessel and hold off the enemy until the dynasty flagship withdraws to a safe distance.

traits.locale_text: Encuentras una única orden emitida por lady Theodora. El grupo de abordaje debía infiltrarse en la nave xenos y contener al enemigo hasta que la nave insignia de la dinastía se retirara a una distancia segura.

languages.text: あなたはレディ・シオドーラから発せられた一通の命令を発見する。乗り込み部隊は異種族の船に潜入し、王朝の旗艦が安全な距離に撤退するまで敵を食い止めるよう命じられていた。
languages.original_text: You find a single order given by Lady Theodora. The boarding party was commanded to infiltrate the xenos vessel and hold off the enemy until the dynasty flagship withdraws to a safe distance.

traits.locale_text: あなたはレディ・シオドーラから発せられた一通の命令を発見する。乗り込み部隊は異種族の船に潜入し、王朝の旗艦が安全な距離に撤退するまで敵を食い止めるよう命じられていた。

languages.text: 你找到了西奥多拉夫人发来的命令。登舰小队奉命潜入这艘异形飞船，拖住敌人，直到王朝旗舰撤退到安全的距离为止。
languages.original_text: You find a single order given by Lady Theodora. The boarding party was commanded to infiltrate the xenos vessel and hold off the enemy until the dynasty flagship withdraws to a safe distance.

traits.locale_text: 你找到了西奥多拉夫人发来的命令。登舰小队奉命潜入这艘异形飞船，拖住敌人，直到王朝旗舰撤退到安全的距离为止。

languages.text: Leydi Theodora tarafından verilen tek bir emir buluyorsun. Bordalama ekibine zeno gemisine sızarak hanedanlık sancak gemisi güvenli bir mesafeye ulaşana dek düşmanı uzak tutma emri verilmiş.
languages.original_text: You find a single order given by Lady Theodora. The boarding party was commanded to infiltrate the xenos vessel and hold off the enemy until the dynasty flagship withdraws to a safe distance.
